dt-example.title: Click and drag button
dt-example.info:
The [ColReorder extension for DataTables](https://datatables.net/extensions/colreorder) allows the end user to click on a column, and then drag it to reorder the columns. The `-content reorder` content type for ColumnControl works with ColReorder to provide this same functionality, but limiting the mouse down listener for activation to just the button.
This example shows `-content reorder` being used to allow end user column reordering. `-content order` is also used to provide consistent styling for the data ordering icons.
